data.persona: I am a visitor to the kingdom.  I come from many miles away.  My aunt lives here in the kingdom.  I will be staying with her for my visit.
data.description:
You are in the Bazaar.
This place is made from oak wood. It is very small due to the wood aisles. The front of the store has a big wooden table as well as a scale.
There's an aisle, a gold bar, an oak wood, an a scale, a coin, and a big wooden table here.
The villager and the prince are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I will get the aisle back to find directions.
data.mid_motivation: I will use the aisle to find my way back to the Bazaar.
data.long_motivation: I will get the Bazaar to get an unlimited supply of oak wood.
